translations: 金色的；镀金的；（语言）华丽的；灿烂的

sentences.sentence: Breeze blow with wheat field, running in the aureate country with freedom.
sentences.translation: 微风吹动着麦田，在金色的国度里自由奔跑。

sentences.sentence: If family circumstances is rich, still can give aureate is silver small lock even.
sentences.translation: 假如家境富裕，还会赠予镀金的甚至是银制的小锁。

sentences.sentence: Young girl also can be gone after luxuriant aureate, perfume is not exceptional also!
sentences.translation: 年轻的女孩也可以追求华丽的金色，香水也不例外！
